description: An exclusive character for the first http://anidb.net/a505 [Captain Tsubasa] anime series and related films, she does not appear in the original manga. She is a French nikkei that supports the Japan national football team when they travel to Europe to play matches. In her appearances, Rika`s role functions as a rival of sorts to http://anidb.net/ch30218 [Nakazawa Sanae].
name: Oozawa Rika
